title: Fawad lauds PM’s personal efforts for return of 85 Pakistanis
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 20 (APP): Minister for Information and Broadcasting Chaudhry Fawad Hussain Tuesday paid rich tributes to Prime Minister Imran Khan for making personal efforts to repatriate 85 Pakistanis, imprisoned abroad.
The Eid festivities of those 85 Pakistanis’ families were the result of prime minister’s sincere individual efforts, he tweeted.
کسی بھی حکومت نے بیرون ملک پاکستانیوں کیلئے اس احساس کا مظاہرہ نہیں کیا جو عمران خان کرتے ہیں، ان 85 خاندانوں کی عید کی خوشیاں وزیر اعظم کی ذاتی کاوشوں کا ثمر ہیں اب تک کئ ہزار لوگ جو بیرون ملک مصائب کا شکار تھے وطن واپس پہنچ چکے ہیں pic.twitter.com/Vre9qZdTCN
— Ch Fawad Hussain (@fawadchaudhry) July 20, 2021
“No (past) government had ever shown the same feelings for the (incarcerated) expatriate Pakistanis as Imran Khan does,” he said adding thousands of such people, who were suffering abroad had returned home so far.
